text: Mid haystay cilmi Kitaabka ah10 wuxuu yidhi: Aniga baa kuugu keenaya il biriqsi gudaheed. Oo markii uu (Sulaymaan) arkay isagoo barbarkiisa yaal (carshigeedii), wuxuu yidhi: Kani waa fadliga Rabbigay_ si uu ii imtixaano inaan mahad naqo ama aan abaal dhaco. Oo mid kastoo mahad naqa wuxuu u mahad naqaa naftiisa, oo mid kastoo abaal dhaca, haddaba hubaal! Rabbigay waa mid kaaftoon, sharaf Badan
